communications.subject: Ohio Open Records Law Request: Arrest Bodycam & Reports
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

All items related to incident Call Number 25-18647 / Control Number 25WHI18647-AR, involving Xavier Burley on August 4, 2025:

All body-worn camera footage, dashcam footage recorded by responding officers.

The incident report(s) and arrest report(s) connected to this call.

The corresponding dispatch logs / CAD entries for this incident.

This request specifically relates to the charges of:

Driver’s License – None/Expired

Obstructing Official Business

Please provide the records in electronic format (PDF, MP4, or other digital copy). If any portion of these records is exempt from disclosure, please redact only the exempt material and release all reasonably segregable portions. If the request exceeds the mnimum cost please contact me via email before charging fees.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Rights React
